attributes.additional_details: We want the government to put motions in place for there to be an early general election to ensure the next government is appropriately voted in.
attributes.background: Liz Truss is now the prime minister she has not been voted for by the general public. We have no faith in this current government and are incredibly concerned about their true agenda

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Call an immediate general election to end the chaos of the current government
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781

Hold a General Election within 100 days of the new PM being appointed
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/621931

If a Prime Minister resigns a general election should be called
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/620016
